# What is this?

Get instagram users profile json data with just single line of code.

# Installation

`npm i instagram-profile-data --save`

Then...

```
import instaProfile from "instagram-profile-data";

instaProfile(instagram-username).then((data)=> console.log(data));


```

## Output

JSON data will be visible in console

sample output
